Title: My Life as a Dog
Cast: Anton Glanzelius, Tomas von Brömssen, Anki Lidén, Melinda Kinnaman, Kicki Rundgren, Lennart Hjulström, Ing-Marie Carlsson, Leif Ericson, Christina Carlwind, Ralph Carlsson, Viveca Dahlén, Arnold Alfredsson, Fritz Elofsson, Didrik Gustafsson, Jan-Philip Hollström
Plot: A boy and his brother don't get along well. In order to let their ill mother rest, they're separated and sent each one with their relatives. Ingemar lives with his brother and his terminally ill mother. He may have a rough time, but not as bad as Laika - the russian dog sent into space... He gets sent away to stay with relations for the summer. While there, he meets various strange characters, giving him experiences that will affect him for the rest of his life. Written by Colin Tinto <cst@imdb.com>
Keywords: boy, dog, prank, old man, friend
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 14 wins & 3 nominations.
Actors: Anton Glanzelius, Tomas von Brömssen, Anki Lidén
Writer: Reidar Jönsson (novel), Lasse Hallström | 3 more credits »
Description: Directed by Lasse Hallström.  With Anton Glanzelius, Tomas von Brömssen, Anki Lidén, Melinda Kinnaman. A boy and his brother don't get along well. In order to let their ill mother rest, they're separated and sent each one with their relatives.
